long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides additional functionality for Totalmobile Mobilise and Optimise.

Bulletins: a tile to be able to create/send bulletins to users, and to be able to view any replies where applicable.

Messaging: 'Edit' button to be able to edit message errors, and edit and recreate processed messages. An 'Add' button to add new messages. A 'View' button to view Submit Document message content.

Jobs: a new tile to provide functionality to create locations, raise jobs and then send to and recall from Optimise. You can also send as a Visit straight to the device and recall.

Optimise: alternate appointment booker. App button displays alongside built in booker pencil button

Settings: settings screen to manage permissions and Optimise settings.
